name: DSI+
description:
DSI+ Is an upgraded version of the original DSI game.

DSI was originally developed by me for my studio, Around a week before the DSI+ Release, the studio got shut down and the game was never released. It's been up on GitHub for a while but may as well release it here.

You can download the original DSI version here: https://arch.hub2hub.xyz/downloads/dsi The website was made bad on purpose, because i thought it was a bad game, which it is.

DSI+ Has quite a few bugs, feel free to report them and i'll try to get them fixed!

https://www.hub2hub.xyz/games/dsi

https://github.com/Hubza/DSIPLUS/
